name: Phish Data (DEV)
overview: DEVELOPMENT VERSION - Comprehensive metadata provider for Phish concert videos using the Phish.net API
description:
DEVELOPMENT VERSION - NOT FOR PRODUCTION USE

This is the development version of the Phish Data plugin with experimental features and fixes. Use at your own risk!

versions.changelog:
## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.5.0.0

### Major Release: Phase 1-3 Improvements

#### Phase 1: Configuration & Cleanup
- Removed unused Instagram/Twitter/Flickr API key fields
- Removed placeholder image URLs
- Improved timestamp handling (DateTime.UtcNow)
- Simplified encoding logic

#### Phase 2: Comprehensive Test Suite (980 lines)
- 70+ tests for filename parser patterns
- 20+ tests for UTF-8 mojibake character handling
- 15+ tests for metadata provider pipeline
- 10+ tests for run detection logic

#### Phase 3: Internal Architecture Improvements
- Implemented dependency injection factory
- Centralized API client creation
- Improved error handling (no null returns from API)
- Better testability and maintainability

### Build Quality
- 0 build errors
- Full .NET 8.0 support
- Jellyfin 10.8.0+ compatible

See full release on GitHub: https://github.com/murphy52/jellyfin-plugin-phishdata/releases/tag/v1.5.0.0

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.4.7.1-dev

### DEV VERSION - Collection Fix (Issue #21)

#### Collection Adding Fixed
- Fixed ArgumentNullException when adding movies to collections
- Switched from AddChild() to LinkedChildren approach
- Collections now properly add movies without errors
- Maintains all existing collection functionality

#### Collection Features (Working)
- Automatically creates collections for multi-night runs
- Collection naming: 'Phish {City} {Year}' format
- Detects when 2+ videos from same run exist
- Smart logic: adds to existing or creates new collection
- Async processing - doesn't block metadata refresh
- Uses Jellyfin's native BoxSet (Collection) API

#### Previous Fixes Included
- Error message improvements (Issue #22)
- Fallback parsing: metadata title + filename
- People population (all 4 Phish band members)
- IMDB integration for member details

DEVELOPMENT BUILD - FOR TESTING ONLY

Fixed the collection adding error - should work properly now!
